name: previous
description: A link to the previous page, if there is one.

params.name: text
params.description: The previous page link text. Defaults to 'Previous page', where 'page' is visually hidden.

params.name: label
params.description: Optional label that goes underneath the previous page link providing further context for where it goes.

name: next
description: A link to the next page, if there is one.

params.name: text
params.description: The next page link text. Defaults to 'Next page', where 'page' is visually hidden.

params.name: label
params.description: Optional label that goes underneath the next page link providing further context for where it goes.

name: type
description: The type of navigation. Goes in the aria label for the encapsulating `nav` element. Defaults to "results".

params.name: number
params.description: The link text - usually a page number.

params.name: current
params.description: Set to 'true' to indicate the current page.

params.name: ellipsis
params.description: For specifying if you want an ellipsis at a given point between numbers. If you set this as true, the other attributes aren't required for the same item.

name: classes
description: The classes that you want to add to the pagination.
